citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
The facility has changed veterinary clinics. In this case, the new part-time attending veterinarian needs to direct the
formal arrangements which shall include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the
premises of the exhibitor.
Correct by: 08-11-2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
The facility has changed veterinary clinics.  In this case, the new part-time attending veterinarian needs to direct the
formal arrangements which shall include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the
premises of the exhibitor. 
Correct by:  08-11-2019.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
